description: Core features (Inventory, Character, Tasks) are hidden behind modals, requiring multiple clicks and context switching.
solution: Implement a high-level Tab Navigation (Adventure, Character, Inventory, Social, World, System).

description: RightPanel contains a long list of text/icon buttons that is hard to scan.
solution: Replace quick action buttons with the global Tab Navigation bar or integrate into the new layout.

description: Some elements use standard Tailwind borders/colors. Lacks a cohesive 'fantasy' texture.
solution: Apply 'panel-metal' and 'glass-panel' classes consistently. Use 'Cinzel' font for headers. Enhance 'dungeon-black' theme.

description: GameInterface manages visibility for 20+ modals individually.
solution: Refactor to a 'View Switching' architecture where activeTab determines the main content area.
